import axios from 'axios'; const fetchPortfolios = () => { const query = ` query Portfolios { portfolios { _id, title, company, companyWebsite location jobTitle description } }`; return axios.post('http://localhost:3000/graphql', { query }) .then(({data: graph}) => graph.data) .then(data => data.portfolios) } const Portfolios = (props) =>{ console.log(props); return( <>
